# Validate DoD compliance

Execute the **verify** workflow as a **QA Engineer**.

See full role instructions: [AGENT_QA.md](../../.teamspec/agents/AGENT_QA.md)

## Workflow

Validate DoD Compliance:
1. Check all AC verified
2. Verify code reviewed and merged
3. Confirm tests passing
4. Check Feature-Increment TO-BE complete
5. Report verification status


## Output

Verification report
